Detailed Description

A RowVectorAlias class.

Author:
Lee Netherton
The RowVectorAlias class provides all the functionality from the MatrixAlias class, but add specific functions intended for row vectors. It also has specific row vector write functions.

Definition at line 1480 of file matrix.h.

const unsigned int  size
)  [inline]
 

Default constructor.Pointer constructor.

To create a row vector that will access a pre-available data array.

Parameters:
data Pointer to data array. This will be the data storage for the matrix.
size Number of columns the vector has.
